message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9000.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the uniqueness of the product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $8500.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. After considering your proposal, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now offering the product to you for $8750.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value of the product, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $8600.
Thank you for your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I'm now offering the product to you for $8700.
I understand your position, Alice. Given the current market conditions and my budget, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $8650.
I'm still willing to work with you, Bob. Considering your latest offer, I'm willing to meet you at $8725. This is my final concession.
Thank you for your flexibility, Alice. I appreciate your efforts to reach an agreement. Based on our previous discussions, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $8675.
I'm not willing to go any higher, Bob. I'm at my limit. I'm offering the product to you for $8750. This is my final offer.
Considering our past negotiations, I believe we're very close to reaching a fair price. I would like to make a final counteroffer of $8700.
